pr_title: Remove version parsing support from import declaration

timeline.message: Remove version parsing support from import declaration

timeline.bodyText: error code seems to be a duplicate.
timeline.author: SupunS

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/compiler/ballerina-parser/src/main/java/io/ballerina/compiler/internal/diagnostics/DiagnosticErrorCode.java b/compiler/ballerina-parser/src/main/java/io/ballerina/compiler/internal/diagnostics/DiagnosticErrorCode.java
index edc1812cbe9..2473ee34318 100644
--- a/compiler/ballerina-parser/src/main/java/io/ballerina/compiler/internal/diagnostics/DiagnosticErrorCode.java
+++ b/compiler/ballerina-parser/src/main/java/io/ballerina/compiler/internal/diagnostics/DiagnosticErrorCode.java

@@ -292,7 +292,7 @@ public enum DiagnosticErrorCode implements DiagnosticCode {
     ERROR_INVALID_CHARACTER_IN_XML_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE("BCE0653", "error.invalid.character.in.xml.attribute.value"),
     ERROR_INVALID_ENTITY_REFERENCE_NAME_START("BCE0654", "error.invalid.entity.reference.name.start"),
     ERROR_DOUBLE_HYPHEN_NOT_ALLOWED_WITHIN_XML_COMMENT("BCE0655", "error.double.hyphen.not.allowed.within.xml.comment"),
-    ERROR_VERSION_IN_IMPORT_DECLARATION_NO_LONGER_SUPPORTED("BCE0622",
+    ERROR_VERSION_IN_IMPORT_DECLARATION_NO_LONGER_SUPPORTED("BCE0656",
             "error.version.in.import.declaration.no.longer.supported"),
     ;

timeline.bodyText: We can make this function to have a void return.
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.message:
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang into remove-version

 Conflicts:
	compiler/ballerina-lang/src/main/java/org/wso2/ballerinalang/compiler/parser/BLangNodeTransformer.java
